content.question: Which species is being oxidized in the reaction between <math alttext="Z n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext><mtext>n</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> metal and <math alttext="N i C l 2, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>N</mtext><mtext>i</mtext><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>l</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
